<<<<<<< HEAD
A second friendly epistle to Mr. George Keith and the reformed Quakers who are now convinced that water baptism is an ordinance of Christ ... / by the reformed Quakers old friend Trepidantium Malleus. Trepidantium Malleus.
36 p.
Printed for John Marshal ..., London : 1700.
Trepidantium Malleus is a pseudonym for Samuel Young. Imperfect: pages stained and tightly bound with some loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
=======
A second friendly epistle to Mr. George Keith and the reformed Quakers who are now convinced that water baptism is an ordinance of Christ ... / by the reformed Quakers old friend Trepidantium Malleus. Trepidantium Malleus.
36 p.
Printed for John Marshal ..., London : 1700.
Trepidantium Malleus is a pseudonym for Samuel Young. Imperfect: pages stained and tightly bound with some loss of print. Reproduction of original in the Huntington Library.
John Marshal
